attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament Immediately In Light Of Lack of Trust Over MPS Expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following recent revelations over MP expenses and a failure to provide an immediate remedy, parliament should be immediately dissolved with a general election called as the country is in an impossible situation when the public have absolutely no trust in ANY MP to carry out their duties correctly, whilst some MPS have not broken rules it is fair to say all knew of the rules and goings on yet nothing was said until the cat was let out of the bag and suddenly everyone MP is saying how wrong it is, the current House of Commons cannot go ahead and lead the country or itself out of this mess with any trust

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
